name: integration-payments-lemon-squeezy
description: Lemon Squeezy payment integration with checkout, subscription management, and webhook verification.
postMessage:
Set LEMON_SQUEEZY_API_KEY, LEMON_SQUEEZY_STORE_ID, and LEMON_SQUEEZY_WEBHOOK_SECRET in .env
Import: import { createCheckout, handleWebhook } from '@/integrations/lemon-squeezy'
